overview.en: Focusing on providing the most authorized and accurate blockchain industry index platform for professional blockchain investment institutions around the world, CoinWhiteBook is dedicated to being the Dow Jones in the blockchain industry.CoinWhiteBook is facing the world, offering services including but not limited to blockchain information integration, market analysis, and data reporting of Bitcoin, Ethereum, EOS and so on.
overview.zh: CoinWhiteBook致力于为全球区块链专业投资机构打造最权威、最精准的区块链产业指数平台，立志成为区块链行业的道琼斯集团。面向全球，提供比特币、以太坊、EOS等多种区块链信息聚合、行情分析、数据深度挖掘等服务。对接币圈所有评级机构，帮助专业投资机构快速了解区块链行业变化，为投资交易决策提供参考。
